games.title: Randomice
games.description:
A procedural Metroid-like with no fights, focused on exploration and route-planning, in which you play a mouse trying to escape from an ever-changing house.

Each run is a compact Metroid-like experience, in which you will find upgrades to explore the house differently each time. From a magnetic grapple to reach a metallic faucet, to a rideable rocket that can burst through the glass blocking the way, you will find many upgrades, each with its own uses.

You must adapt to the tools in your possession to determine where you can go, the thrill of the game coming both from the platforming mastery, but also from the mental mapping of where you can go in the house at any given time. When you obtain a new item, you need to update this mental map to determine the best possibilities, optimize your path, and decide where to go next to maximize the chances to exit quickly.

The ability to follow an efficient path is important during races, in which all the competing players will have the same game configuration and must exit the house as fast as they can. But the game is also designed to be enjoyed solo and slowly, thanks to a single-player progression that lets each player discover the challenges at their own pace.

games.title: My Monsters
games.description:
My Monsters is a VR action-adventure game that stands out for its 100% hand-painted art, immersing players in a world of fantasy and surrealism. The game's deep narrative explores humanity's greatest inner monsters, such as anxiety, fear, and loneliness. The player is transported to the dream-like world of Onirium, where they meet Moti, a frightened little monster with no memory.

In My Monsters, you are not alone; team up with your inner monster, Moti, and face various enemies, solve complex puzzles, and overcome challenges side by side. This unique partnership mechanic allows players to deeply connect with Moti, using empathy and courage to overcome obstacles and discover fragments of a meaningful dreamlike tale. Each stage of the game reveals new aspects of this collaborative relationship, culminating in moments of self-discovery and profound understanding.

games.title: NFL Retro Bowl '26
games.description: Kick off the NFL season with some retro football fun. This year's game debuts an exciting new mode, NFL Retro Bowl Championship Leaderboard, allowing players to represent and compete as their favorite teams in weekly matchups that align with the league’s schedule.

games.title: Jeopardy! Daily
games.description: Step into the spotlight and test your knowledge with the only Jeopardy! game that fits perfectly into your daily routine. Experience the thrill of America's Favorite Quiz Show wherever you go. This features global leaderboards, unlimited Loops mode and a brand new daily Palettes game.

games.title: Korean Drone Flying Tour Bussodamak
games.description: This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed.

In this casual puzzle with a touch of kitchen creativity, your mission is to organize the ingredients—or rather, toys—into pots styled like gift boxes. The goal is to fit all the pieces onto the board and fulfill the demanding orders of the customers.

games.title: Eggconsole Lord Monarch PC-9801
games.description: Take the throne as ruler of your nation, govern your lands, and read the ever-changing tides of battle to conquer all enemy nations!

Explore a vast interconnected world chalk full of tricky platforming challenges, diverse characters, quirky boss fights, and a whole bunch of juicy secrets; as you work towards your ultimate goal to become the very best!

games.title: Tokyo Underground Killer
games.description: Dive into the neon-drenched deep underground of Tokyo as Kobayashi, a deadly assassin who harnesses the power of blood energy. Use your sword, mystical abilities and powerful weapons to assassinate highly dangerous maniacs and stop the invasion of the brutal Flatliners terrorizing Tokyo.

games.title: Boomerang Jack
games.description: Boomerang Jack is an action-adventure RPG with free-flowing combat. String together boomerang attacks with kinetic movement and upgradeable powers. Embark on a globe-trotting quest to stop the Pirate King.

games.title: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion
games.description:
From Marvelous First Studio comes an action-packed new entry in the Daemon X Machina series. Fly into battle in your customized Arsenal, unleashing a variety of attacks tailored to your playstyle. Feel the exhilaration of fast-paced combat as you freely explore a deadly and dangerous open world on land or in the air. After taking down your foes, collect their weapons and equipment, and upgrade your skills to expand your options on the battlefield. Suit up for a dark sci-fi story where you can face the titanic boss battles alone or with up to two other players online. New and veteran Daemon X Machina players alike will find a worthy adventure here.

Created and produced by Kenichiro Tsukuda and featuring stunning mechanical designs from Shoji Kawamori, Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion takes the franchise in a dramatic new direction.

Humanity’s fight for liberation begins now!

games.title: LakeLady
games.description: After his girlfriend died in a flood, the surgeon Salvio, in search of the truth behind his missing daughter, enters the "Ward No. 9" of Hongqiang Hospital, shrouded in the legend of the LakeLady.

games.title: Cronos: The New Dawn
games.description: Cronos: The New Dawn is a pulse-pounding, third-person survival horror game that throws you into the heart of a deadly struggle against overwhelming foes, all while uncovering the mysteries of a twisted time travel story.

games.title: Sunchaser
games.description: Bring light back to the darkening town of Mallard by exploring its monster-infested outskirts, hearing its residents' stories, and defeating the dangerous pets of a mastermind light-stealer in this simple top-down adventure inspired by a love of exploring one's own neighborhood.

games.title: Gravity Storm: First Mission
games.description: Break the laws of physics, dash and shoot your way through levels full of hazards and machines gone rogue. In this retro game, you control Project Gravity Storm an advance machine able to control gravity itself; however, the mother computer will not make things easy for you.

games.title: Seeker of the Ruins
games.description: As a fearless dwarf delver, navigate interesting underground labyrinths & ruins, uncover hidden treasures, solve riddles and hide from monsters. Use various items and potions to survive and outsmart environmental hazards in this immersive non-combat adventure. Delve into the unknown and reclaim lost treasures!

games.title: Bad Midwife
games.description: You play as a pregnant woman kidnapped and trapped in an unknown place. Based on true events, survive a psychological horror journey where every step could cost your life, and your baby. Can you get the best final?

games.title: Everybody’s Golf: Hot Shots
games.description: Everybody’s favorite golf game series finally returns to the fairway! Hit the green with a variety of unique characters and courses in online and offline AND single and multiplayer modes!

games.title: Insanity Within
games.description:
Step into the shattered mind of a man haunted by his past in this chilling psychological horror puzzle game. Return to the eerie, riddled manor where you once lived with your wife and daughter, a place steeped in tragedy and shadowed by accusations. Imprisoned for a murder you can’t recall committing, you’re drawn back to uncover the truth, battling the relentless grip of schizophrenia that twists your reality with every step.

Navigate a series of mind-bending puzzles that test not just your wits, but your sanity. As your mental health unravels, the world around you distorts and nightmares seep into reality. Scavenge for meds to hold the madness at bay, but time is your enemy, and every moment pushes you closer to the edge.

With each puzzle you conquer, uncover heartfelt letters from your daughter, addressed to you, piecing together the heartbreaking story of your family’s collapse. Search the manor’s forgotten corners for hidden artifacts that reveal its sinister secrets and the fractured memories you’ve buried deep.

As you descend deeper into the manor’s depths, brace yourself for a devastating revelation. This is a journey of guilt, grief, and discovery where every answer comes at a cost.

games.title: Shuten Order
games.description:
"168 remaining until the end of the world..."

Humanity is approaching its end. A sudden dismemberment murder of the leader of a religious nation that advocates an apocalyptic ideology... Five adventure games are combined into one, centered around a suspenseful story full of mystery and intrigue.

games.title: Mage Tower Massacre
games.description: Blast, cleave, and telefrag your way through hordes of felonious fellas with shotgun magic in this arcade twin stick shooter. Upgrade your spells to ludicrous levels and ascend to bullet nirvana, unlocking more weapons and stages as you play.

games.description: A simple, yet difficult puzzle game. Manipulate two pairs of pentominoes to form combined shapes with the same outline. There are 513 different solutions.

games.description: Love the golden age of 2D platformers? Jolly Land Adventure brings back the joy of smooth jumps, colorful worlds, and creative levels in a fresh and accessible way. Whether you're a longtime platformer fan or new to the genre, there’s plenty to enjoy!

What is outside? Why can't she go outside? Even after learning the reason, will you still take her outside?

games.title: D.E.A.T.H.

games.title: Axis Football 2026

games.title: My Father Lied
games.description: My Father Lied is a first person point and click mystery game that tells the story of Huda, who finds herself following an unfathomable secret regarding her father’s 20 years disappearance.

games.title: Candy Shop Simulator
games.description: Dive into a sugary world of sweetness in Candy Shop Simulator! Open your shop, create delectable pastries, manage sales, and expand your candy empire. Satisfy your sweet tooth and build your confectionery legacy now!

games.title: The Case of Andrew D.
games.description: A forensic challenge - help private eye solve cases for their clients using OSINT and digital forensics techniques.

games.title: Bubsy in: the Purrfect Collection
games.description:
Is Bubsy a celebrated icon from the mascot wars of the early 90s or a platforming punchline? The team at Limited Run has built a new collection to find the answer. Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection explores the franchise's troubled history and enduring popularity.

Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection is a playable history that includes games, artifacts and interviews. All of the games have been carefully updated for modern PCs and consoles using Limited Run’s proprietary Carbon Engine. Along the way the team was able to smooth out some of the games’ rough edges.

At the helm of the project is Limited Run’s Audi Sorlie, a producer, author, Bubsy World Heavyweight Champion and arguably the world’s foremost expert on the furry franchise. Together with the team at Limited Run and Atari, he has created the ultimate retrospective celebration of Bubsy, the 3’6” tall 80 pound bobcat (with a pet armadillo named Arnold). What could possibly go wrong?

games.title: Heroes of the Seven Islands
games.description: A party-based RPG with turn-based combat. Heroes of the Seven Islands is a comfy yet challenging adventure with side quests in a vast fairytale world, inspired by 90s games.

games.title: Necropolis Nights
games.description: "Necropolis Nights" is a survival card game where you gather resources, craft, farm, and hunt by day, then fend off zombies at night. Strategize to survive and thrive in a world overrun by the undead.

games.title: Knock on the Window
games.description: Martin has been given an urgent assignment at work. However, for this he had to go to the house of his Boss. And so Martin found himself alone at home, in the middle of a vast field of sunflowers. Everything was going well until there was a knock on the window.

games.title: Firefighting Simulator: Ignite
games.description: Face unpredictable dangers, fight perilous fires with your crew, and save lives in Firefighting Simulator: Ignite. Step into the boots of a U.S. firefighter and play with up to 3 friends or with the help of your NPC controlled crew members.

games.title: Days with My Lonely Teacher
games.description: Study Miss Si’s routine and create "chance" encounters with her! As a student failing in all subjects and having rent and credit card bills due every week, you have to do everything you can to win over the beautiful teacher before graduation, making her leave her boyfriend and become your lover!

games.title: Manalia Notes: A Memory of Innocence
games.description: 2D Shooting Game × A Brick Breaker! Embark on an adventure with the wizards Phurl, Eire, and Till!

games.title: Postal: Brain Damaged - These Sunny Daze
games.description: POSTAL: Brain Damaged - These Sunny Daze isn’t “just a DLC” - it’s a tropical serotonin collapse packed with juicy carnage, alleged jokes, overbaked new levels, even less appropriate enemies and unhinged guns. This is another mag of SPF-free mockery fired point-blank at modern life.

games.title: Crusader Kings III: Coronations
games.description: Mark your ascension to power with Coronations by hosting grand ceremonies that inspire awe and respect in your subjects and neighbors. How will your crowning moment define your reign?

games.title: The Crawling Dead
games.description: The Crawling Dead is a strategy simulation game where you take on the role of a lead scientist tasked with saving Stormveil National Park from ecological collapse. Swarms of invasive insects are devastating the park’s delicate ecosystems, and traditional methods of pest control have failed. Your solution? Genetically engineered parasitoid wasps. Harmless to humans, these beneficial wasps are killers of pest insects and utilize a variety of creepy strategies to manipulate and kill their hosts - turning them into The Crawling Dead!

games.title: Farming Simulator 25: Mercedes-Benz Trucks Pack
games.description: Align your farming business with the stars of Mercedes-Benz and Daimler Truck AG! The Mercedes-Benz Trucks Pack includes 17 machines and tools.

games.title: Dunkadillo
games.description: Finally, a game that answers the age-old question: “What if a basketball was also an armadillo?”

games.title: Bubsy 3D: ReFurBished
games.description: Is Bubsy a celebrated icon from the mascot wars of the early 90s or a platforming punchline? Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection explores the franchise's troubled history and enduring popularity. A playable history that includes games, artifacts and interviews. What could possibly go wrong?

games.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II: Legacy of the Forge
games.description: Put your blacksmithing skills to the test to repair a legendary burnt-down forge. Establish your own home in the heart of Kuttenberg, designing the forge, its surroundings and private quarters with the ability to customise and furnish to aid your gameplay.

games.title: P1: Anchor Light
games.description:
Anchor Light is a first-person anomaly-hunting experience set within a lavish, mysterious lighthouse. In this unique game, light and shadow are your tools and your enemies. You'll need to observe every detail, as each room holds secrets waiting to be uncovered.

A wide spectrum of anomalies will test your perception and sanity. From subtle distortions that question your memory to deeply unsettling scenes, every moment is designed to linger, striking a balance between dread and awe. The finely-tuned gameplay ensures that each run feels fresh and compelling.

Key Features
Tense 'Red Light, Green Light' Mechanic: The music is your guide. When it stops, so should you. Any movement during a music cut can be your last, so freeze, listen, and pray that whatever is hunting you doesn't find you.

Floppy Disk Collectibles: Discover floppy disks scattered throughout the lighthouse to reveal fragments of the past. These memories from previous inhabitants offer crucial clues to the horrors you're facing.

Unlockable Difficulty Modes: Master the game in Normal and Hard modes, then face the ultimate challenge in Nightmare mode, where familiar layouts are twisted into new terrors.

Leaderboards and Endless Mode: Immortalize your fastest times on the leaderboards across all difficulty modes, or test your endurance in Endless mode to see how many floors you can clear without getting caught.

games.title: Operation Octo
games.description: Dr. Odin, a hyper-intelligent octopus, is on a conquest against sunken skeletons. High-tech turrets are at his aid: Pistol Shrimp! Navy Seal! Death Ray! Deploy 'em, guard 'em, and collect more of 'em! Travel across unique biomes and put the dead to rest.

games.title: Katanaut
games.description: Descend into cosmic madness aboard a collapsing space station in Katanaut, a fast-paced action-roguelite. Unleash powerful abilities, master fluid combat, and confront eldritch horrors as reality unravels around you. Survive relentless battles and fight for your very existence.

games.title: Machick 2
games.description: The anti-magic toads are back, stronger than ever, and the magical chickens are unleashing ancient powers to fight them! With even more wands and powers to master, vanquish enemies, collect XP, and upgrade like never before in Machick 2! Get ready to out-magic the menace!

games.title: The Bleakest Keep
games.description: The Bleakest Keep is a challenging action horror roguelike. Survive the horrors of the Keep, upgrade your gear, and earn ranks as you ascend the tower and save the world!

games.title: Antioma
games.description:
Antioma is a touching adventure game about a kid, who spent almost his whole life in the hospital.

Dive into a touching story

The little boy Kiddo has spent most of his life in the hospital. Little does he know what a complicated and fascinating world lies concealed beyond the hospital walls.

Today, on Kiddo's birthday, his mom wasn't around. Instead of her, the boy met Shadow, who inspired him to escape from a hospital and search for his mom.

Solve puzzles, hide and run from enemies, make friends, and help the boy get home.

Real adventures lie in wait for Kiddo! Now his fate is in your hands…

games.title: Garfield Kart 2: All You Can Drift
games.description: Fire Up Your Engines, Because Garfield Is Waiting for You at the Starting Line! Play as one of the eight cult characters from the Garfield universe, fill up your karts, customize your look, and race away at breakneck speeds.

games.title: Bad Cat
games.description:
Cat and granny live in one house — it’s the ultimate revenge of cat vs granny. Take on the role of the most mischievous kitty in this animal simulator game.

In this hilarious prankster game, you’re up to no good as you cause chaos in granny's house. You are a little bad kitten from hell. Your mission is to prank grandmother and her dog in every way possible.

Create chaos, steal sausages, break the TV, play VR games, and mess around like the boss cat you are. Collect your fishes in the aquarium, catch them! You can even turn on the TV to distract grandmother. The goal is to make granny and her dog angry. Will you be able to pull off all your pranks and cause enough prankster chaos to win the day in this 3D pet simulator game?

While you start as an average pet, you will earn the title of a naughty kitty — then the fun begins. In this game, you will play as a cute prankster determined to keep grandmother on her toes.

Your goal is to create as much havoc as possible throughout the house by completing various tasks. There’s always another prank to pull: hide in cupboards, jump on tables, send vases crashing to the floor, or push the dog around. Misbehavior is always rewarded here — no punishments, just pure cat anarchy.

You can even unlock different cat styles and colors to match your mischievous mood. Whether you’re a fluffy orange tabby or a sleek Siamese, you’re always the star.

games.title: Dermapis
games.description: In Dermapis, a point-and-click adventure set (mostly) in an apartment, you take on the role of its resident: Yvette. Meet interesting characters, solve puzzles, and make decisions that can influence the plot.

games.title: Hot Stakes Casino: American Roulette
games.description: Try your luck or manipulate the game in your favor using special powers in a fast-paced gambling experience!

games.title: Temporalysis
games.description: A quick paced 2D rogue-like shooter. Shoot your way through endless waves of enemies, acquire new abilities and new weapons as you take on more difficult foes. Your adversaries are moving too fast? Slow down time to aim better or make a quick escape.

games.title: Dune: Awakening - The Lost Harvest
games.description:
The Lost Harvest is a paid DLC with a complete standalone storyline. A carryall transporting a Miner’s Guild spice harvester has been shot out of the sky, and its cargo could change everything. Your job is to find it.

The DLC also includes several unique cosmetics, including a brand-new vehicle, the Treadwheel, complete with its own unique animations and tier upgrades. The vehicle and other cosmetics provide no material benefit over its base game counterpart.

Other cosmetics include several armor and weapon skins, and the Dune Man building set, letting you build bases in the style of those pragmatic and weathered workers of Arrakis.

games.title: Dune: Awakening - Chapter 2
games.description: Chapter 2 the first major content update. Embark on the next chapter of the main story following the sinister revelations at the end of Chapter 1. Explore new locations, meet new and familiar faces, delve deeper into the nature of your origins, and unravel a web that stretches into the darkest corners of the Imperium.

games.title: Bonelords
games.description: Build up yourself & your defenses in Bonelords! Defend against waves of enemies! Attack using a large variety of weapons & tools! Scale your power, and face the great hordes of Spegroon!

games.title: Shape of Dreams
games.description: Shape of Dreams is an action rogue-lite infused with MOBA-esque elements. Venture into a vivid dream world, and create your own champion by freely swapping skills with whatever you like. Play solo against all odds, or with friends in a 4-player co-op game.

games.title: A Twisted Place
games.description: A Twisted Place is an unconventional Single-Player Horror game with multiple chapters. Wander through a disturbing & mysterious place while hiding from entities and find a way out. Interract with the environment to find tools, information and secrets.

games.title: Trasmoz Legends
games.description: Introducing a brand new retro arcade game designed exclusively for modern computers and consoles, drawing inspiration from the classic Trasmoz Saga for ZX Spectrum and the Amstrad CPC.

games.title: Orcdom
games.description: A traditional tower defense blend of popular elements, placing buildings and casting spells at just the right time to resist the onslaught of orc hordes.

games.title: The Derailed
games.description: The Derailed - a first-person psychological horror game.

games.title: Baki Hanma: Blood Arena
games.description: Enter the brutal world of Baki Hanma: Blood Arena, a thrilling 2D action game inspired by the Netflix anime phenomenon Baki. With gameplay reminiscent of the classic Super Punch-Out!!, this game blends precision, timing, and shonen-style flair to deliver a high-energy combat experience.

games.title: Dead Reset
games.description: Trapped in a terrifying death-loop, surgeon Cole Mason is kidnapped and brought to an underwater facility, forced to operate on a patient to extract an evolving parasitic horror. Dead Reset is a blood-soaked interactive horror, where each death brings you closer to the truth.

games.title: Korean Drone Flying Tour Nakhwaam
games.description: This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed.

games.title: Colorizing: Cozy Days
games.description: Coloring by numbers game for relaxation

games.title: Upgrades & Enemies
games.description: Don't get swarmed in this incremental top-down shooter! Unlock new mechanics and upgrades as you defeat more and more enemies. Let drones aid you in combat and use your abilities to become unstoppable.

games.title: Van Wheel Gone
games.description: Van Wheel Gone is a quirky adventure platformer where you guide an orange van through nine surreal hellscapes to recover its stolen wheels, using strange powers like scissors, headlights, time control, and even flight in a bizarre underworld.

games.title: Cross Pix 2
games.description: Sharpen your mind!

games.title: Make it! Pancakes
games.description:
Get ready for a delicious pancake-making challenge!
Make tons of pancakes and watch your food cart prosper!

games.title: Aery: Viking Saga
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Netherworld
games.description: A weird jellyfish handles marriage crisis with alcohol, drugs, sex, blows and lots of odd characters.

games.title: Roman Sands RE:Build
games.description: Washed up on the shores of a timeless luxury retreat, you find yourself acquainted with its unhinged inhabitants. They await the day that the Sun will swallow the world. You are obligated to serve their whims. There's more to this place than meets the eye. Can you uncover your exit?

games.title: Call of the Void
games.description: "Call of the Void" picks up where "Call of the Machine" leaves off. With our protagonist trapped in the void, suddenly, they hear a voice in their mind. The entity speaking identifies itself as one of the ancient gods Vadrigar, who proposes to the protagonist to escape the void by sending them on a new mission for revenge against the Stroggs. This is in response to the Stroggs transforming the fallen Vadrigars (Chton and Shub Niggurath) and their followers into partially mechanical creatures in the service of the Strogg leader Makron.

games.title: Dual Eclipse
games.description: Delve into mysterious dungeons and discover a way to restore order to the cosmos in this trick-taking dungeon crawler. Evade traps, discover secrets, and strategize with unique trick-taking combat. Change the tide of battle with powerful eclipse cards, strengthen your deck, and parry cards!

games.title: Borderlands 4
games.description: See if you have what it takes to go down in history as a legendary Vault Hunter as you search for secret alien treasure, blasting everything in sight.

games.title: Gloomy Eyes
games.description: Within a world where the sun has stopped rising, the darkness awoke the dead from their graves, and an oppressive leader has cast them out. Play Gloomy and Nena, a zombie and a human , on a quest to find the sun in this dark but poetic narrative puzzle game.

games.title: Chrono Gear: Warden of Time
games.description: Turn back the clock and fight to repair Time itself in this cinematic action platformer with fast sword combat and time-based powers. You are the Warden of Time, Ouro Kronii - be proud and fight hard!

games.title: Coal LLC
games.description: Fill your quota or die. Mine increasingly absurd amounts of coal using some dubious, but effective, mining techniques. Or relax and mine at your own pace in peaceful mode.

games.title: Dicey Bugs
games.description: A roguelike, turn-based deckbuilder, where you control both sides of the battle using strategy to shape the outcome of each turn. Catch cute bugs, customize your dice, and unlock abilities to build powerful synergies to roll your way to victory!

games.title: Bookshop Simulator
games.description: Open your own bookshop! Order books, stock your shelves, and earn revenue. Use your profits to decorate, expand, and hire staff. Collect rare books that give powerful abilities. Adopt a cat to keep you and your customers company along the way!

games.title: Unto the Aurora
games.description: Scotland, 1597. Escaping a death sentence for witchcraft, you set sail on a lonely and uncharted stretch of ocean - navigating and surviving the treacherous, strange and fantastical passage towards a new life.

games.title: Sips and Sonnets
games.description: Run a tea shop in the British countryside and enkindle your love for poetry in this heartfelt visual novel. Play as Ms Meadows, retired journalist and tea enthusiast, as she prepares for her best friend’s long-awaited visit. Listen to customers’ stories, brew tea, and craft wholehearted poems.

games.title: Bratz Rhythm & Style
games.description: Conquer the world of fashion with your new BFFs, the Bratz Pack!

games.title: Magecraft: Spellbuilding
games.description: Craft spell cards, collect new effects, and build the perfect deck as you fight through rounds of turn-based combat. Survive randomly-generated dungeon layouts by countering enemy attacks with your own spells, and make the most of the powers and scrolls you pick up along the way.

games.title: Hold.for.Humans
games.description: Hold the line so that humanity may live another day. Defend the evacuation lanes from the relentless spawns of a rogue AI in this rhythm/roguelite-infused hack n’ slash/tower defense game. Upgrade the last friendly robot on Earth, armed with a unwavering program and purpose: HOLD.FOR.HUMANS.

games.title: Paratopic: Overdub
games.description: Paratopic: Overdub revives the award-winning 2018 liminal horror classic: a twisting 3-in-1 remaster, remix, and sequel to the original.

games.title: Skaldsong
games.description: A free-to-play, singleplayer/multiplayer RPG reminiscent of TTRPGs mixed with MUD games but with content generated by an AI Game Master.

games.title: Soul Slasher
games.description: Soul Slasher is a top down, 1v1 PvP focused close combat game. The arena's randomized obstacles, buffs, and traps make every match different. Slash your opponent's soul and claim your freedom.

games.title: Borderlands 4: Super Deluxe Edition
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Borderlands 4: Deluxe Edition
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: NHL 26
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Hole Digging Simulator 2025
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Square: Trial and Error
games.description:
Square: Trial and Error is a Puzzle Platformer game where you are tasked with restoring Town Square by completing 20 Trial and Error puzzles!

Each level has its own set of rules that you need to figure out by Trial and Error. No hints or clues are given in each level, and you must rely on observation and the outcome of your actions to figure out each level!

The game has a ton of features and fun for you to have! Find buried treasure, solve the riddle of the glitch zone, form your party, decorate your own home, and more!

games.title: Cozy Organizer
games.description: Organize, decorate, align, and stack items in cozy environments.

games.title: Super Mario Bros. Remastered
games.description: Super Mario Bros. Remastered is an unofficial PC remake of the 1985 NES classic. It features enhanced graphics, widescreen support, smoother gameplay, custom resource packs, a level editor, and bonus content like The Lost Levels.

games.title: Roman Empire Wars
games.description: Become an Emperor and guide your Legions to victory. Battle foreign armies and crush your enemies in a tactical real-time strategy game and show the whole Europe glory of the Roman Empire.

games.title: AVTale
games.description: AVTale is a cooperative platformer for two players on one screen or online. Two heroes find themselves in a dark cave full of secrets and dangers. One can only fight, the other can support the ally. Together, solve puzzles, fight monsters and much more!

games.title: Dirtzone
games.description: Experience the ultimate off-road adventure! Drive powerful 4x4 trucks across rugged terrain, deep mud, and harsh weather. Upgrade your vehicles, master challenging trails, and explore untamed lands.

games.title: Campus Life
games.description: In Campus Life you’ll create your own college freshman. Experience the hardships of college in this amusing and engaging life sim game. Study hard and party even harder. Join a fraternity to meet new interesting individuals. It is entirely up to you how your academic career will progress!

games.title: Letters to Arralla
games.description: Deliver letters, parcels, and packages to the residents of Arralla, a small fictional island off the coast of Australia populated by big booty cutie fruits! In this relaxing RPG, you play as a mail delivery turnip covering the holiday of the previous mailman. It’s your job to get the mail where it needs to go by solving visual puzzles and exploring.

games.title: Citadel Anew
games.description: Citadel Anew is a first-person base-building experience. Collect resources, construct infrastructure and manage your colonists. Research new technologies and manufacture new weapons to help you in your fight against the enemy.

games.title: Grey Heritage: Noble Duty
games.description: Grey Heritage: Noble Duty is an anime Tactical RPG. Follow Jaden, as he travels across the land and learns the truth about his country. Learn the origin of the war that leads to Grey Heritage: Faded Vision. Fight enemies in tactical combat and manage your army in this JRPG inspired journey!

games.title: Troublemaker 2: Beyond Dream
games.description: Teenagers, Dreams, and Drugs. Unveil the secrets of South Jayakarta city, set two years after the ending of the original Troublemaker. The journey of the “Parakacuk” gang continues alongside the “Beyond Dream” band in South Jayakarta city in this fun open-world action-comedy beat-'em-up game.

games.title: Daymare Town
games.description: Daymare Town is a hand-drawn puzzle adventure game. You find yourself in a heart of a strange city populated by peculiar Metamorph creatures. This town is full of nooks and crannies, puzzles, secrets and items to collect to help you along the way. Can you escape the nightmare of a day?

games.title: Troleu
games.description: TROLEU is a wacky and chaotic first-person action game that puts you in the shoes of a trolleybus conductor. Keep things rolling smoothly by ensuring passengers' travel validity, but watch out for rule-breakers! From issuing tickets to enforcing rules with your fists, it's all part of the wild ride.

games.title: Kitesurf Runner
games.description: Become a kitesurfing hero in this 2D X-treme sports runner game.

games.title: Gnomer
games.description: The gnomes got no chance ! Drop down through levels filled with hostile gnomes. Kill gnomes, upgrade your gear and buy buildings that will help you on your Journey.

games.title: Trailer Park Tycoon: Raccoon Ranch
games.description: One of the key elements of the game is your production. However, instead of the usual vegetables, pies, and trinkets, you're engaged in growing tobacco, brewing alcohol, and producing goods available only to adults. In addition, you can produce coffee, soda, and energy drinks. All of this can be sold in your store!

games.title: No, I'm Not A Human
games.description: An intimate story about a disaster and guests from underground. People are breaking into your home, but not all of them are true people.

games.title: I Want to Believe
games.description: I Want to Believe is a first-person action game with elements of detective work, simulation, stealth, freedom of action, and driving.

games.title: Hlína
games.description: Immerse yourself in the depressing and atmospheric city of Hlína, where, as a young boy named Oliver, you face the harsh realities of life. Work in a factory, care for your mother, play mini-games, and uncover a deep story in this hand-crafted city.

games.title: eXoSpace Combat Engineer
games.description: Design your ship, choose your target, and embark on a hunt through a randomly generated universe. Each hyperjump leads to a new and unexpected encounter, forcing you to make tough choices. What kind of bounty hunter will you become?

games.title: Synthetic Hopes
games.description: Synthetic Hopes is a puzzle game with original and systemic mechanics sparkled with a few platforming action sequences. You are an enslaved android with a shot at freedom in a dystopian cyberpunk setting. Learn the ways of the world and maybe you'll have a chance to break the cycle!

games.title: Piñata Go Boom
games.description: Piñata Go Boom is a short, incremental experience about smashing piñatas and climbing the corporate ladder. Pick up toys, sell your haul, and upgrade your abilities through a vast skill tree.

games.title: Blood Lily Ghoststories
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Starbug Troopers: The 4 Horseflies of the Apocalypse
games.description: Starbug Troopers is a cute and colorful action game blending turn-based strategy and shoot 'em up elements, set in the cute world of insects. Using your Starbugs, insect-like ships, face off against the four horseflies of the apocalypse who want to pollute your environment and destroy their armies

games.title: LEGO Voyagers
games.description: From the makers of LEGO Builder's Journey comes a new 2-player co-op adventure about friendship and play. When two friends make it their mission to rescue an abandoned spaceship, they embark on a journey beyond their wildest dreams.

games.title: Glint's Trial
games.description: Take control of Glint, a glowing explorer on a mission through 15 pixel-perfect platforming levels filled with deadly traps and quirky enemies. Inspired by classic retro games, Glint’s Trial delivers tight controls, charming pixel art, and speedrun-ready challenges. Whether you're hopping past spikes or dodging fishes every level is a handcrafted test of reflexes and memory. Can you survive the trial and prove you're a true retro platforming master? A game developed by CraePlay and ported by GGmuks

games.title: Into the Evernight
games.description: A retro-styled tactical RPG with a heavy emphasis on player choice and branching story paths. Long ago, the sun went out and the world went dark. Now, the last remaining sources of light are starting to wane. How will you stop the spreading darkness? Or will you even be able to?

games.title: ZeroZeta
games.description: ZeroZeta is a minimal, precision racing game with chill ambient music. Glide through hand-crafted levels, chase personal bests, and discover the flow of perfect runs.

games.title: Henry Halfhead
games.description: Meet Henry, merely half a head, but with the peculiar ability to possess and control any object within their reach. Discover every object's unique properties and abilities and cleverly combine them to progress through Henry’s not-so-ordinary everyday life.

games.title: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Claws of Awaji
games.description:
The first expansion for Assassin's Creed Shadows.
Add over 10 hours of additional content with a new location, quests, enemies and gears.

games.title: Unidentified Feline Obliterators
games.description: Unidentified Feline Obliterators is a multiplayer arcade space shooter where you play as cats shooting deadly balls of matter in space! Their natural predators are the jetpack dogs, treadmill porcupines, and rocket rats. But what else is out there in space out to get these cats?

games.title: Lighthouse of the Souls
games.description: Lighthouse Of The Souls is a third-person action roguelite with RPG mechanics and realistic graphics. Face the challenges of a dark and supernatural world solo or in multiplayer co-op, where survival depends on your skill and strategy.

games.title: Rana Card
games.description: "Rana Card" is a roguelite card game where you manage a farm, complete KPI for the Frog.Draw cards in exciting, tense moments, you’ll navigate or exploit time explosion, earn packs and chests, build your deck, and play cards to earn gold.Face strategic choices, disasters, cataclysm along the way.

games.title: A Simple Ball Game
games.description: A spherical action platformer where you guide a ball into a goal by... rotating the entire level?!

games.title: Polar Star
games.description:
Outsmart enemy AI in a row of turn-based duels that work by the rules of Rock, Paper, Scissors.

Blast your way to the top in a deadly tournament of turn-based duels, break the game rules by unlocking various items that turn the power balance upside-down. Calculate all possible outcomes and carefully plan your moves, or just give into the rush and relentlessly gamble with your life on the line.

games.title: The Dark Legacy
games.description: The Dark Legacy is a first-person psychological horror game where players explore an abandoned surgeon's estate. Uncover hidden memories, solve narrative-driven puzzles, and face the chilling consequences of forbidden experiments. The game emphasizes atmospheric storytelling over jump scares.

games.title: Concierge
games.description: Concierge is a challenging, suspenseful nonlinear adventure about an old man and an older hotel. Discover your identity and explore your purpose in a surrealistic world of puzzles and trials of every sort. You're on your own - but you are not alone.

games.title: Tune My Car: Tuning Studio & Mechanic Simulator 2025
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Atomfall: The Red Strain
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Keep the Balance
games.description: There's only one rule in this game: Keep the Balance. Everything else is a comical and frustrating war between you and gravity. Take good care of your keyboard.

games.title: Lord Ambermaze
games.description: This world and all life in it have stopped. Only your steps can force the flow of time to move. In this adventure, time is your best ally and your enemy. You need to restore the flow of time - and for that purpose, you'll have to delve into the depths of the underworld and challenge the evil Lord.

games.title: Flick Shot Rogues
games.description: Flick Shot Rogues is a turn-based rogue-lite that turns movement into a skill shot! Aim and flick your hero to ricochet through levels, dodge enemy attacks, and smash your foes with crazy trick shots. Featuring near-endless replayability, fun upgrades, and a ton of mayhem.

games.title: Zoe Begone!
games.description: Hand-drawn bullet-hell! A frenetic shooter combining the run-and-gun mechanics of Metal Slug with the infinite loops and shmup-ing of Resogun, wrapped up with old-fashioned drawn-on-film style animation. Fight your own creator as the artist bears down on you with pen and paintbrush!

games.title: Strange Antiquities
games.description: Become the custodian of a store dealing in occult antiquities. Explore the quaint and gloomy town of Undermere, where strange goings-on and dark mysteries abound. Find and identify arcane artefacts, use your collection to aid the townsfolk with their unusual problems — and remember to pet your cat!

games.title: Type-Noise: Shonen Shojo
games.description: Traumatized youth trapped in 'Noise Scramble City', a labyrinth of their own fears. Amnesiac teens solve puzzles in a multi-ending escape adventure.

games.title: Jelly Troops
games.description: An online action RTS where the tide can turn in a flash! Fight exciting battles where you recruit golems to battle your opponent’s slimes, cleverly redirect their slimes with walls, or sneakily steal their flag to make a dramatic comeback.

games.title: Naroike
games.description: Naroike is a casual side-scrolling game that combines roguelite and hack-and-slash elements. Collect a wide variety of artifacts and use your skills to defeat enemies.

games.title: Race Jam
games.description: Experience the thrill of the 1990s with Race Jam - an action packed arcade-style racing game! Featuring retro-inspired tracks, high speed gameplay and an authentic throwback vibe. Race Jam: Exhilarating 90's Arcade Racing like you remember, But BETTER

games.title: Sphenoid
games.description: Sphenoid is a horror escape room that takes place in a prison. You wake up to find that everybody has disappeared. As you explore the prison, you will find clues and puzzles that you will need to solve in order to escape.

games.title: Arctic Awakening
games.description: A first-person narrative adventure set in the unforgiving Arctic. Your plane crashed in a storm, leaving only your court-mandated therapy bot for company as you journey to find your co-pilot and uncover the mysteries buried beneath the ice.

games.title: I, Bag
games.description: A mystery visual novel in theme of reincarnation and science-fiction. Opposite to other game, you are not the hero takes item bag, you are the bag yourself! You forge, dissolve, combine, throw, absorb items to change the fate of heros. Has 200 endings and 30+ hours main story.

games.title: Moros Protocol
games.description: Your mission is not just to survive, but to face yourself, your past and prepare for "a world full of darkness and monsters". A stylized pixel painted FPS roguelike game, that combines the feel of early action-adventure games, with innovative mechanics.

games.title: Extinction Rifts
games.description: Extinction Rifts is a fast-paced FPS where you get stronger as your combo increases! Inspired by classic shooters, you will battle your way through secret enemy headquarters and destroy the Ancient Monoliths with your devastating gauntlet!

games.title: I Hate My Waifu Streamer
games.description: Draw the attention of the streamer at any cost, before someone else does it. Write comments, chat, make donations to your waifu, but do not dare to hate her!

games.title: Burden of Truth
games.description: The Burden of Proof saga continues! Step into the shoes of legendary prosecutor Conrad Cross during a pivotal moment of his journey. Investigate crime scenes, solve mysteries using evidence, and make your case in the courtroom. The burden lies with you to unravel the truth!

games.title: Platypus Reclayed
games.description: 22 years after its first appearance, the iconic Platypus is coming back, featuring updated gameplay, new weapons and additional content. Get ready to dive into the heart-pounding action of this fast, frantic, and incredibly fun arcade-style shoot-em-up!

games.title: Class of Heroes 3: Remaster
games.description: The classic, school-based 3D dungeon-crawling RPG is back! After a 15-year wait, the third installment in the series comes to the West, with new features, more characters, classes, and bigger dungeons.

games.title: Megabonk
games.description: Smash your way through endless waves of enemies and grow absurdly powerful! Grab loot, level up, unlock characters and upgrade to create unique and crazy builds as you fend off hordes of creatures!

games.title: LAN Party Adventures
games.description: Okay, Pedro is AWOL, and you have to get this LAN Party set up at the Game Store for the session later. Connect cables, install software, and solve puzzles all while you and the gang uncover the mystery of your missing friend.

games.title: Hyke: Northern Light(s)
games.description: The young witch Hyke's adventure begins! A thrilling 2D top-down action pixel RPG. Relax and camp with your companions!

games.title: Heroes Against Time
games.description: A roguelite where you gather allies and build the perfect team in a dangerous enchanted forest. Navigate events, fight enemies and dig through ruins while trying to avoid the creeping magical fog… Will your team endure… or be lost to the mist?

games.title: Formula Legends
games.description: From the golden age to the modern era, race through time in Formula Legends. Master reimagined circuits, command legendary cars, and chase glory across decades of motorsport history. A love letter to Formula racing, where speed, skill, and strategy define the champion.

games.title: The Quintessential Princesses: Fantasy, the Abyss, and the Magic Academy
games.description: Your goal is to become the private tutor of five underperforming quintuplets on the verge of flunking out of the Magic Academy, and guide them toward graduation.

games.title: Pill Fight
games.description: A minimalist wave-shooter, focusing entirely on the gameplay with 6 diferent maps.

games.title: Emotionless: The Last Ticket
games.description: Liminal cosmic horror - you'll wander in an abandoned amusement park, walk along empty tunnels and crawl through narrow corridors. Join a ride and step into the dark. Explore eerie remains of a world that shouldn't exist. Find clues and discover the truth, but beware, some things should stay buried.

games.title: Liuyin's World
games.description: A 3D cyber-fantasy ARPG with metroidvania levels & multiple endings. Combat rewards aggression – hesitation means defeat. In a world where the Wheel of Reincarnation, corrupted by tainted energy, became an AI that merged flesh, souls, and machines to create new life, survivors reject this evolution.

games.title: Monkaru Fanta: Yuusha to Suishou no Shoujo
games.description: Monkaru is an orthodox, retro-inspired turn-based fantasy RPG where you travel to defeat The Demon Lord with the help of a girl who was sealed in a crystal. The game is by Experience with character designs by Yuji Himukai and monster designs by Akifumi Yamamoto.

games.title: Mai: Child of Ages
games.description: Travel through time and help Mai and her Grandfather uncover the mysteries of the world after the Last Great War. Explore the connections between ancient eras and dystopian futures in an adventure that blends thrilling combat with precision platforming.

games.title: W3dge
games.description: W3DGE is a fast-paced, minimalist arcade game about swallowing wedges before they can stab into you. The walls are closing in and the wedges are lined up endlessly in every direction. How long can you survive?

games.title: Frostpunk 2: Icebreaker Edition
games.description:
The ICEBREAKER EDITION of Frostpunk 2 is a special version of the game that includes some unique extras. In addition to the base game, which lets you build and manage a city in a post-apocalyptic world, you'll get:

• A New London pop-up diorama, a detailed miniature model of the game's frozen city.
• An official artbook, featuring behind-the-scenes concept art, sketches, and more.
• A novella called "Warm Flesh", a gripping short story set in the Frostpunk universe.

games.title: Korean Drone Flying Tour Daechon Beach
games.description: This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed.

games.title: Wander Stars
games.description: Wander Stars is a turn-based RPG with roguelite elements where you make your own attacks by combining words! Create your own fighting techniques, befriend your rivals, and explore the universe in this story-driven adventure inspired by 90s anime.

games.title: Eclipsium
games.description: Eclipsium is a trippy and surreal horror game that will take you on a journey through darkness and confusion. In this haunting and immersive experience, you'll need to traverse a dark and twisted world to reach a tower that's looming in the distance.

games.title: Folly Of The Wizards
games.description: Folly Of The Wizards is a comedic 2D roguelike action game that puts you in the shoes of a clumsy wizard apprentice. Join a wacky wizard cult and use unique spells to defeat enemies, explore procedurally generated dungeons, and save the world from chaos.

games.title: No Vacancy Tonight
games.description: Imagine waking up trapped in an abandoned motel. When you manage to get out of the room, a phone rings in the distance... In this point & click adventure game in 3D, you will have to use your wit to solve puzzles and find out what happened.

games.title: Marisa of Liartop Mountain
games.description: 'Marisa of Liartop Mountain' is an adventure-roleplaying game, where you, the player, will play as Reimu and explore a mountain of books filled with mysteries and lies in search of the whereabouts of the missing Marisa.

games.title: Project: Nova
games.description: Solve puzzles in VR, Explore the Nova Aurora, Repair its damaged systems! As the last engineer onboard, experience the isolation of being stranded alone. As you progress through the story you will face puzzles and consequences which will determine the fate of the voyage. How will you proceed?

games.title: A Gentlemen's Dispute
games.description: Be the last gentleman standing in this old-fashioned slapstick party brawler! Wield preposterous and laughable items and collect insane perks to cause maximum chaos. Destroy your private islands, gardens, and ballrooms. Anything it takes to prove yourself the most gentlemanly of them all!

games.title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie Video Game
games.description: Experience and play through the Super Mario Bros Movie in an all new epic way through an action packed retro story driven 2D Platformer!

games.title: Dying Light: The Beast
games.description: Dying Light: The Beast is a thrilling standalone zombie adventure set in a tightly-crafted rural region. Play as Kyle Crane, a legendary hero who breaks free after years of brutal experiments. Now, he must realize there’s more at stake than just revenge.

games.title: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter
games.description: A remake of the first installment in the main Trails series, serving as the beginning to the Liberl arc and the series as a whole. The game follows protagonists Estelle Bright and her adopted brother Joshua, who journey through the country of Liberl to train to become senior Bracers, members of a non-government multinational organization that acts to keep the peace and protect civilians.

games.title: Chalice of Highland
games.description: Embark on an epic adventure inspired by Gameboy aesthetics. Explore the world and dive into six challenging dungeons to recover the Chalice of Highland.

games.title: Dungeons & Drivers
games.description: Experience a Bullet Heaven rogue-lite on wheels: gear up, battle relentless foes in an action-packed adventure!

games.title: Warborne: Above Ashes
games.description: Fierce flames of war are now raging. We roam, fight, and defeat all who stand in the way of our ambitions. Join a faction in the sci-fi post apocalyptic-style multiplayer PvP war game Warborne Above Ashes, and fight for honor!

games.title: Dreams of Amelia
games.description: Amelia is very lonely. Working a corporate job leaves you with few chances of getting a boyfriend. And hey, Amelia has her "needs" too! But everything changed when she bought an old book, on the local flea market... with a demon inside! YOU are that demon. Make Dreams of Amelia come true!

games.title: Sokobos 2
games.description: A puzzle game about pushing vases into a cart, but you can push the cart too!

games.title: Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree
games.description: In this Roguelite set in a far-off mystic realm, ancient forces stir, and untold dangers await. As Towa, lead the guardians of the sacred tree in forging strong relationships and powerful swords to fight Magatsu’s forces and determine the future of Shinju Village.

games.title: Mind the Clown
games.description: Take on the role of Mike, a lonely child trapped in his worst nightmare: a sinister circus. Move carefully and stay hidden to survive the demonic clown stalking you. Explore the circus and uncover its secrets to save your life.

games.title: Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree: Deluxe Edition
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: StrangeDream
games.description: You had a dream, but you found that you couldn't wake up, and the content of the dream was very strange. Everything reasonable but unreasonable will happen here. You can only explore step by step, and finally choose to return to that restless urban era Do you really want to go back?

games.title: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter: Steelbook Edition
games.description:
Flip through the pages of the iconic Trails series to where it all began with Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter! This stunning remake reimagines the beloved classic with new breathtaking visuals, refined gameplay, and the first unforgettable adventure across Liberl Kingdom.

Join Estelle Bright and her adoptive brother, Joshua, as they embark on their journey as junior bracers, determined to climb the ranks of their renowned peacekeeping guild. What begins as a straightforward mission to prove their worth quickly evolves into a gripping adventure of intrigue and peril, as they unravel a conspiracy that threatens the very heart of their homeland.

Experience the story that redefined the JRPG genre and set the Trails series on its legendary path!

games.title: Gabby’s Dollhouse: Ready to Party
games.description: Throw a party with Gabby and the Gabby Cats. Explore magical worlds – enjoy fun activities, minigames and rewards playing solo or with a friend.

games.title: EA Sports FC 26: Ultimate Edition
games.description:
Pre-Order EA SPORTS FC 26 Ultimate Edition by 26 Aug to get:

- Ultimate Team ICON Player Item (untradeable) for EA SPORTS FC 26
- Ultimate Team Player Evolution for EA SPORTS FC 25 (sold separately)
- Ultimate Team 1 of 5 Player Pick ICON Player Item (untradeable) for EA SPORTS FC 25 (sold separately)

Ultimate Edition preorder offer includes‡:
- Up to 7 Days Early Access
- Season 1 Premium Pass

Ultimate Edition also features:
- 6000 FC Points over 2 months††
- 1 additional Ultimate Team Player Evolution Slot
- Standard Edition Clubs and Career content

games.title: Xeno's Adventure
games.description: Xeno's Adventure is a run and gun action game with focus on boss fights and harder difficulty. You will explore different worlds, battle mind controlled monsters and bosses, all in a drawn 2D Pixel Art style.

games.title: Gates of Eden
games.description: Imagine "Doom" but in Heaven. Demons, evil creatures, and rebellious warriors have taken over the Kingdom, and it's your job to restore order to paradise. Fight to protect the Garden of Eden and defeat the Prince of Darkness.

games.title: Baseless
games.description: Baseless is a challenging planet-jumping shooter that defies gravity. Shooting = Movement: blast from planet to planet with 360° gravity, creatively demolishing every enemy in your path to save your family. Fire powerful weapons, adopt cute friends, and discover a galaxy worth fighting for!

games.title: Bloodthief
games.description: Bloodthief is an ultra-fast melee dungeon-runner where you use momentum to parkour through hazardous dungeons and brutally slash through enemies. Speed-run through medieval dungeons and castles and learn what dark secrets lie beneath the surface.

games.title: The Art of Reflection
games.description: The Art of Reflection is a first-person puzzle game where you traverse mirrors as if they were natural extensions of space. Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and perform gravity-shifting acrobatics through a sprawling environment as you learn to navigate this world with mastery.

games.title: Color Fear
games.description: Today on the Color Fun Coloring Show they want Viewers to Help them Find out Who is Breaking into Their House.

games.title: Deadly Days: Roadtrip
games.description:
Deadly Days: Roadtrip is an exciting action roguelite, that combines reverse bullet hell gameplay with strategic inventory management.

Start your road trip through the zombie apocalypse! Fight your way through, gain experience and collect items to assemble an epic inventory.

Craft more effective weapons and find out what items you can combine to withstand the ever-increasing waves of zombies.

games.title: Transparent Her and Real Me
games.description: This game is a bishoujo game developed and published by Kawayi Play.

games.title: Endless Legend 2
games.description: With a mysterious, ever-changing world, unique factions, and epic storytelling, the much-awaited sequel to the strategy game classic ENDLESS Legend is here, opening a new chapter of the award-winning ENDLESS universe. Write your legend and unveil the secrets of a dreamlike ocean-planet on the verge of extinction.

games.title: Jinchou
games.description: A block-pushing puzzler set to atmospheric, eerily beautiful lo-fi tunes. Make your way through hundreds of challenging levels through different terrains. Each terrain granting special abilities, improving on the basic idea of block-pushing.

games.title: Witchy Business
games.description: Manage your very own Witchcraft Shop. This is a job simulator game where you brew potions for your customers, collect oddities, grow flowers in your garden, upgrade your alchemy station, and thrive.

games.title: Lhea & the Word Spirit
games.description:
Master battle timelines and guide lost souls in this turn-based strategy adventure with peaceful vibes and meditative tactics. Easy to learn, surprisingly deep.

May the stars align in your favor!

games.title: Oceanides of the World's End: Legend of the Big-breasted Swimsuit Beauty Guardian
games.description: "Fast-paced, rogue-like defense action game with simple controls! The Ark of Beauties in Swimsuits, 'GFM Oceanus,' is inhabited solely by stunning women. Neptes must battle the Deep Ones threatening them and unravel the mystery of the 'Great Mother of the Abyss.'"

games.title: Cargo Simulator
games.description: Manage your own warehouse. Fit and pack products into boxes of the right size. Deliver them to the correct addresses—safely and on time. Hire staff, train them, and speed up your operations. Partner with brands to expand your warehouse and grow your logistics network by purchasing more vehicles.

games.title: Mystery of the Malign
games.description: Investigate. Interrogate. Descend into a world of intrigue to untangle the Mystery of the Malign.

games.title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Digital Deluxe Edition
games.description:
This bundle includes:
• Base game
• Season Pass:
- Sonic Prime Character Pack - Rusty Rose, Tails Nine, Knuckles the Dread (Available at launch)
- 6 Content Packs, which include guest characters, vehicles, tracks, emotes, and more from some of your favorite pop culture franchises.
* Additional content will be released sequentially after the game is released.
* Please check the official website for product details and release schedule.

games.title: Baby Steps
games.description: Play as Nate, an unemployed failson with nothing going for him, until one day he discovers a power he never knew he had… putting one foot in front of the other. Explore a world shrouded in mist, one step at a time. Hike the serene mountains by placing each footstep yourself, in original physics-based gameplay from the minds behind Ape Out and Getting Over It. Take in the sights, fall in love with the local fauna, and try to find meaning in a wasted life.

games.title: The House of Tesla
games.description: A brand-new adventure from the creators of The House of Da Vinci. With new handcrafted puzzles, hauntingly beautiful locations and challenges for your brain’s gray (or blue) matter. You will be able to look at the world through the eyes of one of the most famous inventors, Nikola Tesla.

games.title: Silent Hill f: Deluxe Edition
games.description:
Hinako's hometown is engulfed in fog, driving her to fight grotesque monsters and solve eerie puzzles. Uncover the disturbing beauty hidden in terror.

Silent Hill f is an upcoming game set in 1960s Japan featuring a beautiful, yet horrifying world.

Deluxe Edition Pre-order Bonuses:
- White Sailor School Uniform
- Omamori: Peony
- Item Pack
- 48-hour Early Access

Deluxe Edition Contents:
- Full Game
- Digital Artbook
- Digital Soundtrack
- Pink Rabbit Costume

games.title: Blippo+
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Butter Side Down
games.description: Butter Side Down is a bizarro choose-your-own-choice game. Starring Basil Bonser, Adam Spargo, Grey Michael, Beatrice, Jeep Johnson, and Rotten Ruggerio. Answer questions, take calls, play card games, and solve one hell of a mystery.

games.title: Creepy Redneck Dinosaur Mansion 1 Re-Raptored
games.description: Jack Briar is back to stop Bayliss’ dastardly Disaster once more! Rediscover every room, dino, and puzzle from the original match-3 survival horror comedy RPG metroidvania—now fully reraptored!

games.title: Road59: A Yakuza’s Last Stand
games.description: Born as the heir to a crime syndicate, yet longing for an ordinary and peaceful life, the kind-hearted protagonist fights desperately to protect their loved ones. Set against a backdrop of towering skyscrapers, this visual novel weaves together the lives of 23 characters in a modern-day legend.

games.title: Touhou Makuka Sai: Fantastic Danmaku Festival Part III
games.description: "Touhou Makuka Sai ~ Fantastic Danmaku Festival Part III" is a bullet hell shooting game with an arcade golden age style. It is the third game in the Touhou Makuka Sai series. The strange moon seems to hide a new conspiracy. Charge into the deep world on the eternal night!

games.title: Explosive Odds
games.description: Gamble with your life in this explosive PvP game for 2-4 players. Cut wires, earn cash, use abilities and avoid the detonators. Test your luck, skills and remember to always bet on the boom!

games.title: Command Deck
games.description: A sci-fi roguelike deckbuilder where you explore the galaxy, face hostile aliens, and upgrade your starship. It will take adaptability and strategic thinking to survive and uncover the secret your enemies want to keep hidden.

games.title: My Favorite Coworker
games.description: A virtual pet device in the corner of your screen! Feed and play with your pet while you work or play for dopamine boosts that makes even mundane tasks a little more fun!

games.title: Consume Me
games.description: Consume Me is a darkly humorous personal game about my relationship with food. The project started out as a collection of prototypes which drew from my past experiences with dieting and disordered eating.

games.title: Prince Nikolai and the Vampires
games.description: In this SRPG, play as Prince Nikolai and gather an army of colorful, diverse heroes as he needs to save his kindgom from the threat of his archrival, the arrogant and ambitious vampire Zarius.

games.title: Silent Hill f
games.description:
Hinako's hometown is engulfed in fog, driving her to fight grotesque monsters and solve eerie puzzles. Uncover the disturbing beauty hidden in terror.

Silent Hill f is an upcoming game set in 1960s Japan featuring a beautiful, yet horrifying world.

games.title: Jamboy: A Jelly-cious Hero
games.description: Jamboy and Billy are devoured by a giant and now they have to escape from its guts! Explore the giant's intestines as you defeat food monsters in this frantic, multi-genre game and go on a stomach-churning adventure!

games.title: Sworn
games.description: Sworn is a 1-4 player co-op action rogue-like. Explore and reclaim a fallen Camelot from the reign of a corrupted Arthur and his Knights of the round table.

games.title: Fuel Station Simulator
games.description: Are you ready for the most comprehensive fuel station simulation ever? Manage your fuel station, your shop, the car wash, the workshop, your employees and much more…

games.title: Ayasa: Shadows of Silence
games.description: Dive into Ayasa, a dark and mysterious platformer where light and shadow hold the key to survival. Journey through six haunting lands, solve challenging puzzles and restore balance to a world on the brink of collapse.

games.title: Effulgence RPG
games.description: Effulgence is a party-based RPG in a sci-fi setting. Players will explore a distant, possibly extinct world, battle its hostile inhabitants, craft gear, and develop their characters. All graphics in Effulgence are made of text symbols, making it visually unique.

games.title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds
games.description: Race across land, sea, air, space, and time in Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds! Warp through Travel Rings into new dimensions where something new awaits around every twist and turn.

games.title: Agatha Christie: Death on the Nile
games.description: Death on the Nile is an adventure-detective game, offering a fresh twist on Agatha Christie’s famous story. Set in the lively 1970s, play as Hercule Poirot and detective Jane Royce as they solve two connected mysteries. Dive into a journey filled with intrigue, deception, and unexpected revelations.

games.title: Buggos 2
games.description: Buggos 2 is a horde-based auto-battler where players command a sentient hivemind to evolve and deploy massive swarms of alien insects against human forces. The game features permanent upgrades, specialized unit types, and strategic control of the battlefield to overwhelm increasingly advanced enemies.

games.title: Mamorukun ReCurse!
games.description:
Descend into The Netherworld in this explosive cute ‘em up, where Curse Bullets let you adjust the challenge as you go!

Embark on an adventure filled with breathtaking environments, bizarre creatures and bullets, to save the Netherworld and seal the gate to the World of Darkness.

games.title: NubiaPhobia
games.description: Solve the wacky point & click puzzles filled with horror and humor. Break the witch's curse on your home as you explore five distinct regions, each hiding a sacred key to unlock the village chest.

games.title: Before Exit: Gas Station
games.description: Your beloved employee is back! Before Exit: Gas Station is the next game in the franchise. You clean up your workplace, take care of the last customers, and make sure everything is closed. If every task is complete, you are safe. Otherwise, your boss will not be pleased!

games.title: Touhou Kichouden: Mythos of Phantasmagoria 2
games.description: The second chapter of the Chuhou Joutai origin story.

games.title: Out of Time
games.description: Out of Time is a fast-paced, multi-player co-op roguelike where your squad, gear, and teamwork decide survival. Battle through a fractured world where past, present, and future collide - facing swarms of corrupted enemies, brutal bosses, and chaotic mini-games all before time runs out.

games.title: Winter Games Collection + Advent Calendar
games.description: Hop aboard a train and ride through the Winter Valley discovering 25 exciting and fun games!

games.title: The Search For Above Average Life
games.description:
The Search for Above Average Life is a light-hearted bullet-hell adventure where friendship is a matter of overcoming the language barrier. Play as SAAL, a lonely exploration robot, scanning planets and befriending the galaxy’s strangest inhabitants.

Choose how to communicate—Speak, Write, Gesture, or Dance—then dodge red “misunderstanding” projectiles and collect green “understanding” to build trust. Expand your star map, meet eccentric aliens, unlock hints, and discover what it means to find life that’s truly above average.

games.title: 9 R.I.P. Sequel
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Korean Drone Flying Tour Wonsan-do
games.description: This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed.

games.title: Dynamic Chord feat.Liar-s Remaster Edition
games.description: A Dynamic Chord feat.Liar-S remaster which includes content previously only present on the Vita port.

games.title: Games Advent Calendar 2025 Bundle
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Employee 925
games.description: Employee 925 is an existential horror game about work, meritocracy, and performance evaluation.

games.title: Hotel Barcelona
games.description:
"Hotel Barcelona," where serial killers from all over the United States are said to have gathered. You must defeat them and check out before all the blood is spilled.

Japanese game creators SWERY65 and SUDA51 have teamed up to create this ambitious work. Don't miss it.

games.title: Unit Down Charge
games.description: A futuristic action rail-shooter! Action packed, and full of quirky character dialogues, unique level designs, and epic boss battles!

games.title: Legends of Savvarah: Flowers and Scorpions
games.description: You are Nikaria. An agent of a mysterious god, sent to another country. Does the end justify the means? Is the will of the god above the law? Is the death of a non-believer insignificant? The decision is yours alone.

games.title: Dread Protocol
games.description: Embark on a thrilling 3rd-person space adventure. Engage in merciless combat, wield a vast arsenal, and explore procedurally generated environments. Take down the Federation, one station at a time.

games.title: Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian
games.description: A mainline Atelier game that's completely offline, standalone, and without gacha elements. This mainline entry sticks to the longtime traditional Atelier series gameplay experience while also building upon it. Atelier fans can enjoy an evolution of the familiar Synthesis and Turn-based Battle systems, culminating in a heartwarming story for all to enjoy. A separate original title set in the same world of the "Atelier Resleriana" gacha game awaits from developers Gust & Team Ninja.

games.title: Holy Shot
games.description: Holy Shot is a fast-paced, physics-based top-down shooter. Face nasty hordes of monsters in a chaotic environmental destruction, combining powerful weapons and strategic abilities to survive intense battles against challenging bosses.

games.title: Silver Daze
games.description: Collect cards and battle monsters in this retro style coming-of-age JRPG!

games.title: Cloverpit
games.description:
You wake up in a rusty, narrow cell, standing over a dangerously unstable grate.

Someone has kidnapped you, demanding payment, and your only way out is to play the Slot Machine and pay off your debt.

Don’t let yourself fall —literally— into ruin!

games.title: City: Battle Ground
games.description: A card strategy game inspired by the principles of Auto Chess and roguelike genres. Dive into a criminal beast-metropolis where cops, bikers, gangsters, zombies, and even superheroes battle for control of the streets. Build a crazy deck, combine faction abilities.

games.title: ReLinked 0.26091975
games.description: Grab your gun, slap on some modules, and get out there to destroy hordes of alien invaders on a procedurally generated and fully destructible map!

games.title: EA Sports FC 26
games.description: The Club is Yours in EA SPORTS FC 26. Play your way with an overhauled gameplay experience powered by community feedback, Manager Live Challenges that bring fresh storylines to the new season, and Archetypes inspired by greats of the game.

games.title: Nandome ka no Hajimemashite
games.description:
Kinou Yumeto lives a hollow existence. He went to a mediocre university, got a job at a mediocre company, and realizes that there’s something missing in his mediocre life.

Then one day he crosses paths with a demon named “Laplace” when everything disappears and he suddenly finds himself 13 years in the past. Before him are familiar friends, a familiar school and a familiar life.

“If I can rewrite the world, perhaps I can change my life as well…?”

Yumeto spends his days enjoying these nostalgic and fun times. But there’s also a girl intertwined with his memories that he does not remember…

games.title: Mr. Prepper: Uranium Project
games.description: Gain access to a long-abandoned nuclear power plant, manage unstable uranium to craft powerful tools and weapons, advance through a new storyline, and decorate your bunker in a whole new way!

games.title: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer
games.description: Dash into the enchanting world of Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer and embark on a holly jolly quest to save Christmas in this magical adventure inspired by the beloved 1964 animated classic!

games.title: Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac
games.description: PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC modernizes, updates, and enhances the fan favorite 3D Platforming adventure in nearly every way! Venture across PAC-LAND to reclaim the golden fruit and put a stop to the ghosts and their dastardly boss, Spooky!

games.title: NBA Bounce
games.description: Step onto the court with your favorite NBA team and mascots. Dribble, dunk, unlock gear, and play solo or with friends in fun game modes.

games.title: Pac-Man World 2 Re-Pac: Deluxe Edition
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Legends of the Round Table
games.description: Lead the Knights of the Round Table through King Arthur's legend in a unique RPG, full of honor, magic and romance. Plunge into a colorful world inspired by medieval art, tales and music. Undertake perilous quests and fiercely defend your kingdom to make the flower of chivalry blossom again.

games.title: True Vikings
games.description: Choose your own path: become a powerful jarl or a legendary king, or perhaps switch sides and follow the path of a knight, reliving the story of the Duke of Normandy.

games.title: Idle Boss Rush
games.description: Slay giant bosses and turn the hollow wasteland into the almighty kingdom! Endlessly rewarding incremental game where you collect fountains of rare loot, unleash crazy combos and watch the monsters fall under your knees. Boss Rush that keeps on going when you're gone!

games.title: Ghost Shock
games.description: Switch roles between heroes and monsters to fight, become the embodiment of justice or let evil rule, everything is possible.

games.title: Who Trained the Hero?: Spin of Fate
games.description: "Who Trained the Hero? -Spin of Fate-" is a slot-powered roguelike where you customize your reels, team up with allies, and forge the hero destined to save the world!

games.title: Chaos Code: Nemesis Experiment
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Run TavernQuest
games.description: A role-reversing twist on old school text adventure games. You're the command parser and game master for an artificial player named STEVE. Who knew that running an RPG would be so frustrating?

games.title: Creep
games.description: Experimental dark platform game that takes place inside a struggled man's inner world represented as the worm world. You control the worm form of this man as he shows why this world exists and how it's like to live there. You also visit past memories/analogies and gain new abilities.

games.title: Heart of Muriet
games.description: Unique voxel fantasy real-time strategy. Experience the land of Muriet and reunite your family in this epic real-time strategy game! It's a game for people who love RTS games, but intense micromanagement stops them from playing.

games.title: Afterblast
games.description: Afterblast is a challenging FPS rogue-lite action game. Play solo or in co-op. Features dynamic gameplay with randomly generated dungeons, so don't hesitate to obtain the power, unlock new loot, and find a way to save your planet. Stand up against the gods and fight against hordes of monsters.

games.title: Wink and the Broken Robot
games.description:
