Explore the weird and cute post-apocalyptic world of The Outskirts while collecting coins and mysterious ancient treasures like floppy disks and cassette tapes

Wink is taking inspiration from Gameboy classics like Super Mario Land 2 and Link's Awakening, but doing its own little thing.

games.title: Multi Idle
games.description: Multi Idle is an idle game that features Exploring, Adventuring, Hero's, Dungeons, Raids and many more in its own kind of idling way. Get stuck in an endless loop of trying new things every time you play!

games.title: Windswept
games.description: Our feather-shelled heroes were swept away by a storm, and they need your help! In this '90s-inspired platforming adventure, take on over forty handcrafted stages to discover the secrets of their world, the moon and beyond!

games.title: The Perfect Pencil
games.description: Help John on his journey of personal growth. Unravel the nuances of human reactions to fear. Surprising exploration, fast paced combat, complex choices and allegorical characters, all intertwined with a psychological narrative in this hand-drawn 2D action-platformer.

games.title: Bits & Bops
games.description: Bits & Bops is a collection of original rhythm mini-games. Featuring over 20 mini-games filled with catchy music, snappy gameplay and gorgeous, hand-drawn animation, Bits & Bops is sure to brighten your day.

games.title: Good Heavens!
games.description: Good Heavens! is a procedurally generated open world crafting RPG for 1-8 players. Be a farmer, hunter, trader or warrior and explore the promised lands full of different races and cultures. Lead the heavens to salvation or who cares, find the best werewolf tavern and get drunk.

games.title: Olliefrog Toad Skater
games.description: Olliefrog Toad Skater is the amphibian-based skateboarding game where its easy to be steezy! Create your own little custom cute frog or toad and hit up the local skatepark for a brief skating session, or tackle the more extensive story/career modes and ollie, grind, and kickflip your way to the top.

games.title: King of Conquerors
games.description: Your journey from adventurer to king will begin here!

games.title: Glaciered
games.description: Glaciered is an action-adventure indie game that takes place on a glacier-covered Earth 65 million years in the future. Play as a Tuai, a species evolved from birds, to soar through the seas and fight against the threats to this new golden age of life.

games.title: Lou's Lagoon
games.description: A cosy open world adventure about running a seaplane delivery service. Customize your character, discover new islands, harvest goods, solve a family mystery, and work to keep an adorable island community afloat.

games.title: Bunker Builder Simulator
games.description: Plan your work, dig a hole and build a bunker, that will survive anything! Manage safety, needs and moods of your clients, so you can become the best architect and earn a fortune. Will you be able to meet the expectations?

games.title: Nowhere Manor
games.description: House of stolen devil bargains and indolent angelic aristocracy: Nowhere Manor is doomed to disappear. You can leave if you’ve got a soul … but that’s not an option for an artificially created servant such as Liber. Just how far are you willing to go escape?

games.title: Murder on the Stella
games.description: It's a murder mystery. It's an adventure. It's a cruise vacation simulator. It's different each time you play.

games.title: Elation for the Wonder Box 6000
games.description: Elation For The Wonder Box 6000 is a first-person, claymation adventure game about going into the city to try and find a game from your youth that no one else remembers.

games.title: Huni Kuin: Beya Xinã Bena
games.description: A 2D platform game about the ancient stories of the Huni Kuin indigenous people, who live in the Brazilian Amazon. The entire game was produced in collaboration with the Huni Kuin communities of the Jordão river, in Acre.

games.title: Anomalistic Revolution
games.description: Unsolved mysteries, unknown questions, lies and superstitions become history. With this new invention, it is now possible to reach absolute truths from the universe of zeros and ones. Anomalistic Revolution is a a story-rich game with 2D action-runner mechanics.

games.title: To the Grave
games.description: To the Grave is a 2d horror adventure puzzle game full of oriental elements. The young girl's father died in an accident and her mother insisted on taking his body back to her hometown for burial. After solving many crises in the mysterious village, they gradually approach the truth.

games.title: 150 Floors
games.description: 150 Floors of Magic or 150 Floors for short, is a tile-based, real-time strategy RPG where you play as a mage with either a Fire, Ice or Electric element, with more to come. Each mage has a wish they want granted or goal they want to meet. The only similarities they share is each mage wants to reach and conquer the 150th floor, granting them any wish they desire... Or so the saying goes. Beware, the floors made of tiles have a durability limit. If you attack a monster, you're also attacking the tile as well and it may break, sending the monster one floor down. The same logic also applies to you. If you fall through, you drop to the previous floor. Defeat all monsters on a floor, and ascend to the next floor. How will you fare against the 150 Floors? Will you get your wish granted?

games.title: Super Fantasy Kingdom
games.description: A roguelite city builder set in a relaxing fantasy world. Explore and rebuild your kingdom to bring it back to its former glory. Defeat hordes of enemies with an always unique team of defenders. Harvest, capture, build, mine, cook, brew, feed and grow. But be prepared to watch it all burn!

games.title: Delivoo Delivery Sim
games.description: Deliver orders through the large city of Peytor Town and save enough money to open a restaurant. Make sure you're ready, as there's a lot of challenges waiting for you!

games.title: Slipgate
games.description: Explore a gloomy rooms of damned sci-fi base as a doomed marine, only survivor of the portal experiment. Save humanity like in 90's with your trusty shotgun, paving a way through ominous corridors inhabited by the shadows of sinners and evil spirits.

games.title: A Corgi's Cozy Hike
games.description: Em-bark on a therapeutic adventure as a Corgi exploring a peaceful island getaway. Climb the mountain, soar the sky, and sail the seas to uncover treasures and cozy spots. No need to rush. Relax and savor this bite-sized, open-world experience while 10% of your purchase is donated to animal shelters.

games.title: Times Trials
games.description: Flex your math skills with Times Trials - a 2D puzzle fighting game. Arrange falling numbers to solve equations either alone or against friends in head-to-head multiplayer.

games.title: Final Forge
games.description: Defend your tower and protect the dwarf's treasure from marauding creatures in this roguelike survival game. Explore the region, collect resources, and choose the right upgrades. But be careful, don't leave your fortress empty for too long.

games.title: 3 Last Chances
games.description: 3 Last Chances is an Action RPG game with challenging combat and progression system that allows to create your own unique playstyle. You get 3 chances to replay a year, complete quests and find just the right method of weakening and overcoming the seemingly unbeatable final boss.

games.title: Ascend
games.description: Ascend is an adventure puzzle game where a young woman must navigate to the top of a mystical mountain learning the secrets of both the past and the future to find the balance in all aspects of life.

games.title: Toxic Crusaders
games.description: The Toxic Crusaders return for an all-new, all-action beat 'em up for one to four players! Grab your mop, tutu and attitude, and get ready to clean up the mean streets of Tromaville, one radioactive goon at a time!

games.title: A.I.L.A
games.description: A.I.L.A. is a first-person horror game set in a near-future filled with immersive technology. Play as the sole game tester for a revolutionary new fictional AI. Survive intense horror experiences that prey on your deepest fears as the lines between virtual and reality begin to blur…

games.title: Nqc: Non Qualia Character
games.description: RPG where human who became NPC find himself.

games.title: Monke Simulator
games.description: Peel banan, escape containment and shower your oppressors in stench. Top the scoreboards, be the fastest ape and liquefy your neurons in this stink infused parkour shooter.

games.title: Deconstruction Simulator
games.description: Deconstruction Simulator is a game that allows you to experience the thrilling world of demolition and recycling! Take on the role of a skilled demolition manager and transform unwanted items into valuable resources.

games.title: Movierooms: Cinema Management
games.description: Become the manager of your own Cinema in this thrilling new Tycoon! Through space and time, explore the various aspects of handling a thriving business. Manage movie choices and screenings, staff, rooms, and more!

games.title: Vultures: Scavengers of Death
games.description: Face zombies and fearsome monsters in this turn-based survival-horror roguelike as you seek the path to recover a valuable artifact. Unravel the history of Salento Valley and its downfall after a bioterrorist attack led by a secret cult involved with the powerful corporation Eugenesys Tech.

games.title: Small Kingdoms
games.description: Rule a small fantasy kingdom and conquer your rivals as you build up cities and armies on the world map and command troops on the battlefield. Small Kingdoms is a streamlined grand strategy and RTS game with small procedurally generated world maps, and campaigns you can complete in a weekend

games.title: Luctus
games.description: "Luctus," brought to life through pixel art, delves into Nora's intricate and dramatic story. As you experience this mysterious tale, you will find yourself exploring an original world, getting to know diverse characters, and engaging in epic action moments by conjuring various flame spells!

games.title: Golel
games.description: Golel, a first person roguelike Dungeon Crawler.Combat is focused on mobility and using the environment to your advantage.Dropping book shelves on an enemy, or kicking an enemy into a trap are all valid tactics.Deep skill/magic and combat gameplay, with many development paths.

games.title: Cute Survivors The Musical
games.description: A musical rogue-like adventure where you lead a band of adorable cats. Feel the rhythm-based abilities to unlock new band members, levels, and songs. Each member brings unique instruments and abilities, allowing you to overcome the hordes of enemies with the power of music!

games.title: Fantastic Haven
games.description: Restore the equilibrium of magic by saving endangered fantasy creatures. Build your shelter to welcome and protect them, explore unique regions, rally neighboring populations to your cause and rehabilitate creatures in their natural environment.

games.title: Roll The Bones
games.description: Select spell-dice for your loadout, roll them and wreak absolute havoc! This high-paced pixelart roguelite will let you build unique loadouts with extremely interactable spells. Let's roll some bones!

games.title: Hell Games
games.description: Get ready for Hell Games: In this 4 player action arena brawler fallen Olympians, once cheaters and dopers, battle it out in the depths of hell. Knock out opponents with sports gear, power up, and strive to be the last one standing.

games.title: Saborus
games.description: Saborus is a horror game that puts players in the shoes of Gisele, a chicken escaping from a deadly slaughterhouse. Immerse yourself in a terrifying world with incredible graphics and a chilling atmosphere, where tension and fear await at every turn.

games.title: Vangaro Tactics
games.description: Command colorful troops into tactical turn-based battles in Vangaro Tactics! Infiltrate enemy outposts on the Stealth Missions: mine, recruit, move wisely, and you'll stand a chance. Know your commanders and exclusive units to make the most of each faction.

games.title: Ammossum
games.description: Build an endlessly upgradable weapon! Evolve projectiles into unstoppable firepower in this action roguelike. Fight through hordes of infected beasts, save your family, and feel the thrill of bloody shootouts filled with bullets, explosions, and acid. Can you survive the madness?

games.title: Glitchspankr
games.description: After a hard day of existing you just want to relax and play your favorite game, Big Booty Slapper 6! Unfortunately, there seems to be a rogue virus eating and corrupting your precious game! Using the GlitchSPANKR Antivirus software, dive into virtual worlds and Spank that Glitch! Or befriend him. Or spare his poor, ugly, miserable life. Maybe give him a smooch... fall in love... Oh, uhem. Well there are a lot of options. Just... get in there and figure it out.

games.title: Hellspresso
games.description: Hellspresso is a fast-paced cooking game that combines restaurant management with strategic planning and development. Serve and clean tables, design your kitchen, discover new recipes, plan your menu, switch to your secret magic kitchen, gain the trust of your customers and unlock all their secrets!

games.title: Granvir
games.description: Granvir is an action roguelite featuring mech building. Scavenge the battlefield for parts to replace and upgrade your arms, legs, torso and weaponry. PIlot your Granvir and manage your campaign between battles to find the best equipment and stay supplied.

games.title: Simulacro
games.description: In this first-person philosophical journey, Poísis, an enthusiastic art student, explores a mysterious island in Greece. As she solves the local puzzles, she uncovers traces of its ancient inhabitants, leading her to question her own reality.

games.title: Dead Weight
games.description: Challenge the Ancient Gods! Set the sails of your flying pirate ship and embark on the adventure in the steampunk world of Dead Weight. Explore floating islands in search for loot. Choose a class or create your own and enjoy turn-based tactical combat on tiny battlefields where every step matters.

games.title: Sunflowers and the Goddess of Death
games.description: A classic style, story-driven RPG centered around a young woman determined to protect her people from fel beasts and the interminable greed of men, all while struggling against the manipulation of a goddess who seems to want nothing more than to paint the world a flowing crimson...

games.title: Seagulls: Crappy Situation
games.description: Get ready for an epic odyssey on the high seas! Take aim with your trusty slingshot and fight against the dreaded seagulls, explore the depths and expand your raft. Gather your crew or play solo – the ocean awaits!

games.title: Amnea28: Two Eternities
games.description: A group of university students is going to spend a week in the old hotel "Amnea". Within these seven days they have to find out what is hidden behind its facade and to unravel all the mysteries without losing their minds.

games.title: Graytail
games.description: Graytail is a Zelda-like action-adventure game with interactive puzzles and combat set on a small island in the Pacific. Find the missing best female pilot and uncover the secrets hidden on the island.

games.title: Eko And The Bewitched Lands
games.description: "Eko and the Bewitched Lands" is a roguelite action RPG game. Help Eko on his mission to save the bewitched lands filled with enemies. Acquire and upgrade weapons of all kinds to combat and discover all the secrets that awaits for you.

games.title: Todokero! Tatakae! Calamity Angels
games.description: Aucune description

games.title: Zurarararush!!!
games.description: Zurararush!!! is a twin-stick shooter that you can play easily! Wear a wig as a weapon and defeat the virus that mutated inside your body! Power up your character and wig and become stronger! Defeat a lot of enemies and feel good! It's an arcade-style casual game that you'll want to play every day.

games.title: Head Chef
games.description: Head Chef is a restaurant management game. Supply the kitchen, select your staff, create a delicious menu and… cook! Make your guests happy and find your way to the stars. Keep control of your team and finances, because the higher you climb, the harder you fall.

games.title: Deflectorium
games.description: Deflectorium: 2D sci-fi rogue-lite singleplayer. Deflect deadly shots back at your enemies to become unstoppable. With unique deflection system, you'll dominate battles while upgrading your skills and stats. Prepare for adrenaline experience where defense isn't just a tactic but an art.

games.title: Gravewatch
games.description: Dive into one of the scariest experiences you will ever get to play! In this horror game, you will get to play as Daniel, a desperate man trying to support his ill daughter by stealing from the dead... however, this time, Daniel will experience hell on earth, as things don't go according to plan...

games.title: Wandness
games.description: Craft wands, create synergies, battle monsters, and survive. Dive into the depths of magic crafting, where you'll forge spells from magical components and elemental gems for endless combinations. Explore procedurally generated dungeons, and unleash your magic madness to overcome the darkness.

games.title: AI.VI
games.description: A mercenary robot is forced out of retirement as the P.A.S.C.A.L. Gigacorporation conquers his planet to squeeze it dry. Combine your FPS and tower defense skills, then send the corporate invaders to the scrapheap, seize the means of production, and take the planet back for the worker bots!

games.title: Below, Rusted Gods
games.description: A short horror game where you control an operator helping an expedition through a hole descending into the unknown.

games.title: Motorslice
games.description: Parkour through the ruins of a megastructure, climb massive bosses, and hunt down every construction equipment in this slice of life action-adventure.

games.title: Adulting
games.description: Growing older has nothing to do with feeling grown up. Face the challenges of adulthood with Liv, Albert and Finja in this interactive visual novel by exploring their everyday lives through point-and-click interactions as well as mini games and figure out the secrets of how to be an adult!

games.title: Cupid's Chatroom
games.description: Find your true love with the help of Cupid's chatroom, a mysterious server that won't let you leave!

games.title: Payout: Shop Simulator
games.description: Build and manage your shop, deliver physics-based products using Van, Forklift and Truck. Hire workers to speed up your progress

games.title: Lifted
games.description:
Step into the Anytime Elevator and get LIFTED — a cinematic single-player 2.5D puzzle-platform adventure from a former Disney ride designer.

Slacker Ari Buktu only pokes his head into Professor Raventhorpe’s lab for extra credit; seconds later he’s hurtling through history on a reckless mission to steal a legendary tiara and fix the professor’s love-life. Each stop opens a new era, a bigger puzzle, and the shadow of a rival tomb-raider who’s always one jump behind…
